price: 42. Et Nous avons créé pour eux des (vaisseaux) semblables sur lesquels ils peuvent embarquer.
arabic: وَخَلَقۡنَا لَهُم مِّن مِّثۡلِهِۦ مَا يَرۡكَبُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wakhalaqnā lahum min mith'lihi mā yarkabūna
